April 30, 1952
Mr. Burton Faulu
KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
Dear Burton:
I am deeply grateful to you for your
letter of April 28th and especially for your thought¬
fulness in sending me a copy of the Morning Tribune
Editorial.
Tou have got to admit that NAEB has gone
a long way if we can crack the editorial columns of your
distinguished newspaper. My dearest hope, of course, is
that we can keep up the past now and in the future.
With all best wishes.
Cordially yours.
Seymour N. Siegel
President
